name: old-pages-sql-scripts
description: Archive folder containing old/unused pages, SQL scripts, and legacy code. Files are kept for reference only and should not be copied directly. If a page is needed, it must be updated to MVVM architecture and integrated properly.

structure.pages: Old page components not in active sidebar
structure.sql-scripts: Old SQL setup/fix scripts (replaced by migrations)

reuse_process: 1. Inform the team - Discuss why this page is needed
2. Create new MVVM structure (Model, Service, ViewModel, View)
3. Update to current patterns (Composer style + Chat/Claude error handling)
5. Update sidebar if adding to navigation
